select t.*,p.plantName from pmc_workshop t left join pmc_plant p on t.plantid=p.id where 1=1 <#if key["workshopName"]??> and workshopName like :workshopName </#if> <#if key["workshopCode"]??> and workshopCode like :workshopCode </#if>
<#if key["sort"]??&&key["order"]??> order by ${key["sort"]} ${key["order"]} </#if>
select t.id as workshopId,workshopName,p.plantName,p.id as plantId from pmc_workshop t left join pmc_plant p on t.plantid=p.id

select id as workshopId,workshopName from pmc_workshop where 1=1
<#if key["plant"]??> and plantId like :plant </#if> order by workshopName
